about_the_game: Morgan MacKenzie - a troubled teen with a checkered past - gets grounded by her father. This leaves her to deal with her crazy grandmother in addtion to a psycho caller. As the night gets weirder, paranoia sets in. Morgan is forced to face some of her worst fears and inner demons as she starts to believe that everyone she knows is either plotting against her or trying to kill her.
